Bastion Web Blocker

Take control of your browsing experience with Bastion Web Blocker! This simple yet powerful Chrome extension allows you to effortlessly block specified websites, helping you stay focused and productive. Whether you want to eliminate distractions during work hours or restrict access to certain sites for a healthier online experience, Bastion Web Blocker has you covered.

Key Features:

    Customizable Blocking: Easily add any website to your block list with just a few clicks.
    User-Friendly Interface: Intuitive design makes it simple to manage your blocked sites.
    Quick Access: Toggle blocking on and off without hassle, allowing for flexibility when needed.
    Privacy Focused: No data collectionâ€”your browsing habits remain private.

Transform your online habits and enhance your productivity with Bastion Web Blocker. Download now and start blocking distractions today!
